title: Dream Aquarium 1.2605
description:
Virtual Aquarium - the latest generation!
The World's most Advanced Virtual Aquarium!


Dream Aquarium is ultra realistic Windows screensaver that creates a virtual aquarium on your desktop, comprising multiple species of fish to better simulate underwater life. An amazing aquarium with 3D realism never seen before in fish, water, plants and all other details. No! They are not real fish! They are 100% computer generated fish. You will be witness of realism in images and their flexibility, pecking objects, interaction with environment, feeding, swimming among the plants, hover around in studying and enjoying life, also beautiful shifting light rays, ground ripples, gently waving plants that fish can swim into, soft shadows cast by fish, configurable bubble streams.

Here are some key features of "Dream Aquarium":

- Fish have articulated fins, moving eyes, gills and mouth.
- Widescreen formatting, multi-monitor support.
- Ability the camera "the screen" automatically moves inside the tank and closely monitor one or more fish!
- Replacing the tank.
- Add bakground picture of your choice
- Feeding your virtual fish manually, also automatically.
- Add and remove an unlimited number of fish when you want.



Requirements:

 - DirectX 9.0 or later installed to display the 3D graphics clearly.
 - A monitor with a display resolution of 1024x768 or more is also recommended.
 - 32 meg graphics card.

 OS: XP/Vista/7/8

Additional Contents: Collection of 78 background tanks with high resolution.
Included Plugins: Creative Fish Packs 1 and 2
